    • advice

      public boolean[] advice(Hand hand)
      Based on the hand advises the best cards to hold when playing the 10/7 Double Bonus
      Specified by:
      advice in interface GameRules
      Parameters:
      hand - Player's hand
      Returns:
      A boolean array. If true then hold that index card in hand, else discard
